name.description: Printed card name. Defaults to empty. | In template, mark with id=name

types.description: The printed types of the card. Defaults to empty. | In template, mark with id=types, or mark each type with type-0, type-1, etc.

flavorText.description: Italicized, bonus story text on a card. Defaults to blank.

set.description: Used to identify the set of a card, which is the batch of designs it belongs to. Defaults to BASE

rarity.description: Used to identify the set of a card, which is the batch of designs it belongs to.

color.description: The color of the card, mechanically. This will be reflected in the frame, etc. Should match any card costs.

art.description: The name of the art for this card. Do not include the file extension: it must be .png. It will be searched for in the relevant project folder(s). Defaults to searching for "card-name-art.png" in the proper art folder, but if this fails, it will keep the template art. | In template, mark with id=art

artX.description: The delta-X value of the art positioning on this card. Defaults to default to 0 (no displacement.)

artY.description: The delta-Y value of the art positioning on this card. Defaults to default to 0 (no displacement.)

isInfluenceBonus.description: Set to true if this item can be revealed for +1 influence. Defaults to false. | In template, mark with id=influence-bonus
